channel.title: A good server base that doesnt lag, crash every minute and n00bs cant mass on it
channel.description: Does any1 no of a cool server base that can hold over 25 ppl, noobs cant massclick on it and doesnt lag like bloody hell? Oh ya and doesny crash every mintue?

item.source: A good server base that doesnt lag, crash every minute and n00bs cant mass on it

item.title: A good server base that doesnt lag, crash every minute and n00bs cant mass on it
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Why read a very long and boring guide that hardly teaches you anything? Get a server with commands and talking npcs.
Here’s what you need to know:
Client.java - search a command like “master”, read it, make your command
NPCHandler.java(?) - search what an npc is saying, read it, make another npc say something.
Not everyone is willing to hold your hand.

Warning - while you were typing a new reply has been posted. You may wish to review your post.
^ Stop that ^

Read full topic

item.title: A good server base that doesnt lag, crash every minute and n00bs cant mass on it
item.dc:creator: @Lilium Lilium
item.description:
@Lilium wrote:

if your looking to run your own server, most sources available don’t crash every minute unless your doing something wrong… try a base like P16, TestScape, CheezScape, or even PimpScape in some cases

but if your looking for a server to play on, you have to remember most servers on the status list are run from people at their houses ^^;

Read full topic
